DOC.brief_summary: the investigators aim is to investigate the effect of continuous preperitoneal bupivacaine wound infiltration versus epidural analgesia on the inflammatory cytokines response after abdominal cancer surgery
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Pre-peritoneal Wound Infiltration Versus Epidural Analgesia in Cancer Surgery
DOC.criteria: ASA IIII patients aged 1860 yr undergo open abdominal cancer surgery general contraindications for epidural analgesia, recent history (8 weeks) of, chemotherapy or radiation, chronic opioid use
